results.title: Jak Knight, Known for the Netflix Series ‘Big Mouth,’ Dies at 28
results.abstract: Mr. Knight, who had been a successful stand-up comedian for several years, was also a writer for the ABC sitcom “Black-ish.”

media.caption: Jak Knight performing at the TBS Comedy Festival in New York in 2017. He was nominated for a Writers Guild of America award for his work on the HBO talk show “Pause with Sam Jay.”

results.title: Jennifer Lopez and Ben Affleck Have a Low-Key Midnight Wedding in Las Vegas
results.abstract: The superstar couple, who got back together last year, waited in line and went to a chapel that Lopez said “graciously stayed open” a few minutes past midnight so they could wed.

media.caption: Jennifer Lopez and Ben Affleck attending a special screening of the film “Marry Me” in Los Angeles in February. They married in Las Vegas over the weekend.

results.title: 4 Killed in Indiana Mall Shooting, Officials Say
results.abstract: The attack unfolded at the Greenwood Park Mall in Greenwood, Ind., on Sunday before an armed man fatally shot the assailant, city officials said.

media.caption: Two additional people were hospitalized in the shooting, city officials said. The authorities did not indicate a motive for the shooting.
